tmux Split The Window Vertically [ Ctrl-B Shft-' ]
tmux Split The Window Horizontally [ Ctrl-B Shft-% ]
tmux Zoom Unzoom Toggle [ Ctrl-B Z ]
tmux Navigate Panes with Arrows or HJKL [ Ctrl-B Right ]
tmux Create new screen (workspace) tab [ Ctrl-B C ]
tmux Next (workspace) tab [ Ctrl-B N ]
tmux Previous (workspace) tab [ Ctrl-B P ]
tmux Goto (workspace) tab with index (numbers 1-9) [ Ctrl-B 1 ]
tmux Close the currently active pane. [ Ctrl-B X ]
tmux Detach from currently active session. [ Ctrl-B D ]
tmux List the currently running sessions. [ Ctrl-B S ]
tmux Rename current screen (workspace) tab. [ Ctrl-B , ]
tmux Scroll the current pane's buffer. [ Ctrl-B [ ]
tmux Resize current pane by a bit w/ Arrows. [ Ctrl-B Alt-Right ]
tmux Tmux Which-Key [ Ctrl-B Space ]
windows Close The Current Window [ Alt-F4 ]
windows Fluent Search Bar [ Ctrl-Space ]
windows Fluent Hinting for current window. [ Ctrl-M ]
powertoys Capture Text From Screen [ Ctrl-Meta-T ]
glazewm Focus Window with Arrows [ Meta-Left ]
glazewm Move Window with Arrows [ Meta-Shft-Left ]
glazewm Resize Window with Arrows [ Meta-Ctrl-Left ]
glazewm Pause All GlazeWM Tiling [ Meta-Shft-P ]
glazewm Toggle Tiling Direction [ Meta-V ]
glazewm Toggle Fullscreen [ Meta-F ]
glazewm Minimize Window [ Meta-M ]
glazewm Close Window [ Meta-Shft-Q ]
glazewm Close Glaze [ Meta-Shft-E ]
glazewm Reload Glaze [ Meta-Shft-R ]
glazewm Redraw All [ Meta-Shft-W ]
glazewm Open Console [ Meta-Enter ]
glazewm Open Browser [ Meta-Shft-B ]
glazewm Open a workspace using Win + Number 1-9. [ Meta-1 ]
glazewm Move current to workspace with numbers. [ Meta-Shft-1 ]
glazewm Move Workspace Monitor using ASDF [ Alt-Shft-A ]
wezterm Resize Pane [ Ctrl-A R ]
wezterm Split Vertically [ Ctrl-A ' ]
wezterm Split Horizontally [ Ctrl-A % ]
wezterm Zoom Unzoom Toggle [ Ctrl-A Z ]
wezterm Create new tab [ Ctrl-A C ]
wezterm Navigate Panes with HJKL [ Ctrl-A H ]
wezterm Resize Pane with HJKL [ Ctrl-A Shft-H ]
wezterm Open tab using index with numbers 0-8 [ Ctrl-A 1 ]
wezterm Close Tab [ Ctrl-A & ]
wezterm Close Pane [ Ctrl-A X ]
wezterm Fullscreen [ Alt-Enter ]
wezterm Paste [ Ctrl-Shft-P ]
wezterm Copy [ Ctrl-Shft-C ]
wezterm Increase Font Size [ Ctrl-Shft-+ ]
wezterm Decrease Font Size [ Ctrl-Shft-- ]
